item.title: New Blog
item.description: New Blog! I decided to start a new blog to talk about software development. Using Clarity theme.

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been a software engineer for over 30 years. Currently I’m a Principal Software Engineer at Domino Data Lab, where I build a data science platform. Any opinions expressed in this website are my own, not my employer’s.
